thankyoumessage: Your grievance is registered with us.
forgot_main: Please enter your mobile number or email address associated with your employee information to regenerate a new 4 digit PIN.
add_details_to_incident: Add more detail to this grievance
gustmessageint: Below is a list of Key Performance Quality Indicators monitored by your healthcare organization, which are applicable to your role. Please select the corresponding KPIs below to accurately input your data.
chooseCategory: Select the relevant KPI to input data
initial_assesment: Average Time for initial assessment of in-patients (Doctors) – MRD ICU
report_error: Average Time for initial assessment of in-patients (Doctors) – MRD WARD
safety_precautions: Average Time for initial assessment of emergency patients (Doctors)- (Emergency Department)
medication_errors: Percentage of Care-plan is documented for inpatients (MRD)
medication_charts: Percentage of Nutritional assessment is documented for inpatients (Clinical Nutrition and Dietetics)
adverse_drug: Percentage of Nursing care is documented for inpatients (MRD - Nursing)
unplanned_return: Average Time for initial assessment of Emergency patients(Nurses)- (Emergency Department)
wrong_surgery: Average Time for initial assessment of in-patients (Nursing-ICU)
transfusion_reactions: Average Time for initial assessment of in-patients (Nursing-Ward)
mortality_ratio: Percentage of Blood culture contamination rate (Lab Service)
theemergency: Percentage of Beta-blocker prescriptions with a diagnosis of CHF with reduced EF (Cardiology - Emergency Department)
ulcers: Percentage of Hospitalized patients with hypoglycemia who achieved targeted blood glucose level (Endocrinology and Diabetes - Emergency Department)
urinary: Percentage of Spontaneous perineal Tear Rate
pneumonia: Percentage of sepsis patients who receive care as per the HOUR-1 sepsis bundle (Critical Care Medicine - Medical records)
blood_infection: Percentage of COPD patients receiving COPD Action plan at the time of discharge (Pulmonary Medicine)
site_infection: Percentage of bronchiolitis patients treated inappropriately (Pediatrics)
hand_hygiene: Percentage of oncology patients who had treatment initiated following multidisciplinary meeting(Tumour board)- (Oncology - Gastro surgery)
prophylactic: Percentage of Intravenous Contrast Media Extravasation (Radiology)
re_scheduling: Average Time taken for triage (Emergency Department)
blood_components: Percentage of patients undergoing dialysis who are able to achieve target hemoglobin levels (Nephrology)
nurse_patient: Percentage of Compliance rate of timeliness of physician responding to the reported critical results (JCI8-IPSG 2.0)- (Medical Administration)
nurse_patient_w: Percentage of compliance to Holding area care(ACC2-JCI8)- (Nursing)
consultation: Number of reporting errors per 1000 investigations- (Lab Services)
diagnostics_l: Rate of redo in 1000 tests- (Lab Services)
diagnostics_x: Percentage of reports correlating to clinical diagnosis- (Lab Services)
diagnostics_u: Percentage of employees in diagnostics adhering to safety precautions- (Lab Services)
discharge: Number of reporting errors per 1000 investigations- (Radiology)
medical_records: Percentage of reports correlating to clinical diagnosis- (Radiology)
emergency_medications: Percentage of employees in diagnostics adhering to safety precautions- (Radiology)
mock_drills: Percentage of employees in diagnostics adhering to safety precautions- (OT)
patient_fall: Percentage of employees in diagnostics adhering to safety precautions- (Nursing)
near_misses: Number of reporting errors before dispatch (Lab)
shift_change: Patient safety events or errors related to pathology samples, such as biopsy or other tissue specimens(JCI8-QPS 3.04)- Lab Services
